articles.description: Pakistan face New Zealand in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Dubai International Stadium, Dubai – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: Pakistan vs New Zealand LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: With interim head coach Lee Carsley not being drawn on the permanent England manager job, BBC Sport looks at what happens next.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: What happens next with England manager search?

articles.description: Nigeria’s players say they will boycott their 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier in Libya on Tuesday after being left stranded at an airport.
articles.title: Nigeria set to boycott 2025 Afcon qualifier in Libya after being left at airport

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes is fit to play in the second Test against Pakistan in Multan, coming in alongside pace bowler Matthew Potts.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Ben Stokes and Matthew Potts return for second Test

articles.description: The top European leagues and players' union Fifpro file a legal complaint against Fifa over what they claim is an "abuse of dominance".
articles.title: Legal complaint filed against Fifa's 'abuse of dominance'

articles.description: The French Rugby Federation expresses its "firm opposition" to the proposed 20-minute red card, saying it is an "unacceptable step backwards" by World Rugby.
articles.title: French Rugby Federation expresses 'firm opposition' to 20-minute red card

articles.description: Lamar Jackson wins his match-up with Jayden Daniels, the Detroit Lions dominate the Dallas Cowboys, and the Buccaneers score 51 points in New Orleans.
articles.title: NFL results & week six recap: Lamar Jackson beats Jayden Daniels and Detroit Lions dominate Dallas Cowboys

articles.description: As we mark the 10th year of BBC's Women's Footballer of the Year award, can you name all nine previous winners?
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year: Can you name previous winners?

articles.description: New Zealand need only three more wins to claim the America's Cup for a third consecutive year.
articles.title: America's Cup: New Zealand take 4-0 lead over Great Britain in Barcelona

articles.description: Republic of Ireland striker Troy Parrott gives his support to Caoimhin Kelleher after the keeper's mistake leads to Greece's second goal in their 2-0 Nations Cup win on Sunday.
articles.title: Nations League: Parrott backs Republic of Irelland keeper Kelleher after costly mistake in Athens
